column5: Hey /dawg you in chat yet???   :P   Art
I was looking forward to it tonight
Until its back up one of you guys should create an OFC Chat room. There are a few websites that allow you to make one for free. Just make it and post the link in the thread.
Get 'er done Matt!!  Is that 5 weeks or 6 weeks now?  S.
Dang!... I missed the "chat bash" thread!  Oh well, it's getting pretty old anyway... but thanks for trying Art.
LOL.. ok.. consider my chain yanked.... and I didnt even know I had a chain!!
:whistling:  :whistling:  so many things to type.... but this is a family site.....   Art
Thats cause its too small to even see
Boy are they gonna be pissed at you chat guys when we gotta shut the site down for two days to install it all...
Two days ??? I'm sure there will be some great fishing stories when we get back
And the productivity level in Ontario will spike.  JF
That's because your Mrs has it firmly in hand on a very short lead.
Nope! But I will be able to give you a comparison between 2 different razors.
So get with the program big boy!  When everyone else is miserable.... the chatters are happy!!!
bumping this  1 month old thread. Any idea when the chat will be fixed.
It comes with the upgrade.. its a pretty big one.. we will have an exact date shorlty, its gonna involve shutting the board down for a day or two.
Do you have a toll free number to call so you can give us updates when the board is down?Oh wait a minute,I think I have that number around here somewhere.I'll post it when I find it. Joe
I can post the Mods' numbers if that will hlep things along.  Sorry about the whole 'toll free' thingy tho.
And I can reverse search the numbers douG gives and provide Home addresses also... just in case it helps...    G.
Thanks for giving us an heads up  TJ!  You guys want to try Chatroulette in the meantime  http://www.thestar.com/news/gta/article/77...-web-cam-creeps
